reviews.title: Even better than I expected!
reviews.review_text: Wow‚Ä¶.these chairs exceed my expectations! They're even better than pictured. The seat is larger than my old chairs I'm replacing. Which makes it perfect to add cushions and they fit nicely for larger bodies. The wood is a bit soft and I'm praying that doesn't affect them holding up for the long term. I enjoy the fact that they came with the adjustable feet that protect against scratches on my wooden floors pre-installed. Easy to put together with bolts already installed which made lining up screws and them catching a breeze. Great product overall. I may need to order another set to finish off seating for 6.

reviews.title: Beautiful and extremely nice quality for the price
reviews.review_text: These chairs are sturdy and very well constructed... beautiful mid century modern color and style üëå

reviews.title: Matched my Dining Table Perfectly!
reviews.review_text: They were daily easy to assemble once you got the hang of it. The cushion is a bit firm for my liking but other than that, the chair feels very sturdy and nice.

reviews.title: Nice for the price
reviews.review_text: These chairs I would say are decently sturdy. One of the 4 chairs were uneven. Thankfully they have foot adjusters. The reason 4 stars instead of 5 is one piece of wood cracked even though there are pre drilled holes. That should have not been the case. The set is nice and looks more expensive than 35$ a chair. I like that it's made from actual wood. Instructions are clear and easy to follow took about 50min to assemble all 4 solo. They meet my expectations and I would purchase them again

reviews.title: Good but hard seats
reviews.review_text: I'd really give this like 4.5 stars. The chairs were very easy to put together, between my husband and I all four took maybe 20 minutes. The cushions are VERY firm which is why I deducted a star.

reviews.title: Good buy
reviews.review_text: Nice solid chairs, one of the screw holes did not line up with assembly. Cushions are firm. Would recommend for a low cost set of chairs
Some of the chairs came scratched and slightly cracked. Most of the pre drilled holes didn't align at all. I had to make my own holes. Sturdy and usable definitely not good quality.

reviews.title: Broke the first time I sat in it
reviews.review_text: Don't buy!! I weigh 160, should not be anywhere near weight limit. The FIRST time I sat in one of the chairs it split down a whole side and fell apart. Surprisingly I did t get hurt. Thankfully it wasn't my grandma or a child that sat in it and couldn't have caught themselves.

reviews.title: Terrible Quality and Terrible Manufacturer Support
reviews.review_text: I strongly advise against buying these Mainstays chairs. The quality is extremely poor and they are a safety hazard. After only one month of normal use, a part for one of the chairs completely broke while an adult was sitting on it. The person was well below the product's stated weight limit, so this is a clear manufacturing defect. To make matters worse, the manufacturer's customer service was just as bad as the product's quality. When I contacted them for a warranty replacement part (just the part not the whole chair), they refused to send it unless I paid a $25 shipping fee. A company should not charge customers to fix their brand new, defective products. Between the dangerous lack of quality and the unhelpful manufacturer support, I cannot recommend these chairs at all. Avoid this product.

reviews.title: don't buy
reviews.review_text: came damaged .. the packaging is difficult and unless you unwrap every single piece first to make sure they're all in good shape you'll end up putting together 3 before you notice. also they don't have pre drilled holes that line up so prepare for a really difficult build !!!

reviews.title: Looks higher end
reviews.review_text: This chair is stunning in person. It looks much more high-end than it actually is. It is a very nice, large seat. My husband does not find them to be ‚Äùcheap‚Äù feeling. The finish is very nice as well

reviews.title: Uneven legs
reviews.review_text: These chairs are a great price point. Pretty simple to put together and look great. Only problem is the legs on the ground were uneven. It came with screws that you can adjust to make it level, but then it doesn't glide in and out of the table as well

Most of the junction are not clean cut. You have to alter/clean/shave off extra parts in order to make it fit. One of the joint came snapped to which you will not be able to screw it or use glue to make it work. Let's see how long the other chair will survive daily use.

reviews.title: Two of my four chairs‚Ä¶.
reviews.review_text: They are beautiful‚Ä¶. If you get the right pieces. Two out of four were painted incorrectly. A couple of cracks in the wood and scratches on the wood. The chairs are sturdy and beautiful, but a pain to put together in my opinion. Waiting to hear back from the company for replacement parts.
the chairs matches well with my dining table and easily assembled.

reviews.title: Nice chairs for the dining room ‚ò∫Ô∏è‚ò∫Ô∏è
reviews.review_text: These chairs are strong!!! My family really likes how comfortable they are.

reviews.title: Great chair
reviews.review_text: This is a great chair for a really affordable price.

reviews.title: Glad i purchased them!
reviews.review_text: we love the chairs. i should have purchased them a long time ago!
Good quality, excellent finish, very durable I will definitely recommend this set. Easy to assemble
Arrived quickly - quick to put together - exactly what was needed!!

reviews.title: Great chairs!!
reviews.review_text: I'm happy with my purchase! I wanted something affordable and nice looking and these were it. Putting them together was somewhat easy and they were delivered quickly.

reviews.title: Good value, nice colors and design
reviews.review_text: Assembly was easy. Just follow the directions. I only concern is the weight capacity of each seat. But for now they seem to work as their supposed to.

reviews.title: Cheaply made and arrived damaged
reviews.review_text: Arrived damaged and customer service refused to send me replacement chairs

reviews.title: Do Not Purchase!
reviews.review_text: Missing pieces as well as damaged ones. Called the number to get replacement parts and no answer!
